title: Scroll Issues
body:
My scroll wheel works just fine out of game, no issues at all.
But in game It wont work, I can't use it for the camera, in the shop, anything.
I tried deleting my whole config folder, didn't seem to fix the issue though.

replies.body: My first thought is that something may have gone wrong with your config, so it's surprising that deleting the folder didn't work.  Are you able to try another mouse?  Depending on what you're using, there could be a software or setting that's causing problems between the game and the rest of your OS.  Let me know.
Sorry for the late reply, but It seems that it's only effecting one account. Everything works just fine on another.
ever get a fix? I am having the same problem. Cant zoom in on champion, cant scroll through shop/ options. Works fine in client.
Sorry for the late reply again, no I have never gotten a fix
